title: Egg Stool Premium Leather/Without piping/Camel
body: If you love reading book on a long cozy night or you just want to relax your tired feet from a long day’s work, then the Egg Stool is the perfect one for you. Designed in 1958 when Arne Jacobsen was asked to design the lobby and the reception area of the exclusive Royal Hotel in Copenhagen. In that perfect opportunity, Jacobsen put his theories of architecture and integrated design into practice and the iconic Egg chair and Stool were one of the biggest success in his design and it quickly became a Mid Century Classic.
